title: IoT-Based Smart Farming System for Vegetable Cultivation in Bebengan Village
description: Designed an automatic irrigation system using Arduino Mega, ESP32, and MQTT. Sensors monitor soil and air conditions; the system is controllable via a web dashboard for remote farm management.

title: Potato Aeroponic and Control System
description: Developed an aeroponic system using Arduino Mega and ESP8266 for IoT. Implemented Laravel-based dashboard and integrated multiple sensors (pH, temperature, humidity, TDS) for real-time monitoring and control.

title: Prototype of IoT Based Package Receiver
description: Built an IoT-based package receiver using Arduino and ESP32-CAM. Integrated Telegram Bot API for user interaction and utilized servo motors and LCD for real-time responses.
